@graph.name: EBI SCXA to AnnData (Scanpy) or Seurat Object
@graph.description:
Creates input file for Filter, Plot, Explore tutorial

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Importing files from public atlases](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/EBI-retrieval/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
